entries.meaning: Resulting from the addition of several sources, parts, elements, aspects, etc. united together.
examples: The combined efforts of the emergency workers kept the river from going over its banks, barely.

entries.meaning: (skiing) Ellipsis of alpine combined.. An event in alpine skiing consisting of one run of downhill and two runs of slalom.
examples: The race events are downhill, slalom, giant slalom, Super G, and combineds, with each giving points in the same way.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of combine
examples: The cook combined equal parts chocolate and vanilla batter in the cake.
